attributes.action: Make our prisioners work and live without luxuries like the criminals they are
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The USA have got their prision system right. They make their prisioners work in chain gangs, they also do not receive the luxury items that we lavish on ours. No 1 should be reward when they commit a crime, they have 2 many rights thanks to human rights laws. When u break the law u shoud be punished not lavished with stuff u would not have on the outside.
